It's a really cool game, just because you need some experience to play it.
游戏刚出的时候就入手了 当时游戏氛围很好，但是也没玩下去近期又开始了上树之旅，发现现在的游戏氛围真的很差屠夫房主的机制也是离谱，只要屠夫发现赢不了分不高直接拔线，还有只要屠夫卡人就直接没法玩屠夫200延迟人就得300，各种闪电侠 穿模刀真的觉得没什么意思推荐心态不好的就别入手 我是因为这些问题一路从7掉到9

十分不推荐萌新玩这个游戏，玩屠夫被人类气的肺炸，而且一分钟找不到人就亮3台机，怎么玩？
玩人类把把都是大神屠夫，进去一分钟就被挂，这游戏对新手恶意太深了。
游戏还是能玩的，就是段位低了真的难排到人，国内可能真的没什么人玩了吧

[h1] My Dead by Daylight Review! [/h1]
   I really do enjoy my time on this game. The functions are very easy and I prefer to play with my older Xbox 360 controller because I know the keys on it so well. Playing as a killer is a little difficult but I always do love a great challenge to hook my prey, haha!! Survivor playing is the best game style I've experienced, the party wait time is much quicker and you can invite your survivors to play with you. Working with friends or random players gives a good spook, especially when the killer plays around with you and lets you out instead of just hooking you. I just really like playing as Kate Denson (My Main survivor choice) because you can obtain a perk that's called [u] Windows of opportunity. [/u] Let's you see the vault or pallet to get away faster highlighted in yellow. I overall give this game a go, try it!

Es muy buen juego lastima que este mal optimisado para aquellos que no llevan los requisitos recomendados sino los minimos, creo que se debe al uso de tantas particulas incluso en los menues. Sin duda lo recomiendo para quienes sean capases de jugarlo con buen rendimiento por mi parte e de devolverlo. : (

I am updating this review in light of recent events and it being the end of the year of 2020.

Here's what will happen:
You buy the game, and then you will hate yourself for doing so. And when you decide to keep the game, all you will be doing is trying to look for a fun experience you will only get 1 in every 15 match ups.

You will hate yourself. 100%.

Great game, bought it on sale for 8 dollars. Don't buy this game unless it's on sale, it's not worth the twenty dollars.
Killer queues are really long for new players, so beware of that and have patience.

This game is really not worth the investment unless you are a streamer or want to be a streamer. it's a massive time sink and a massive money sucker. Try the game out on one of it's many free to play weekends, see how you like it, then buy it. It's not a game for everyone.

The community is a mixed bag, a lot of people are unsportsmanlike assholes who blame everyone else, and sometimes you can get a game with really forgiving and helpful teammates. Don't buy this game if you can't handle losing, because losing is a big part of the game. The community doesn't need more sore losers (or sore winners for that matter.) If you buy the game, just stick around, it gets better with time and experience.
